title: 50:  Pu$$y Eating Playbook (and the Untold Story of Sofia with an F)
description:
IT’S YO BIRTHDAY SO I KNOW YOU WANT TO RIIIIDE OUT
HAPPY 1ST BIRTHDAY TO SOFIA WITH AN F! AKA your girl’s favorite podcast and your mother’s worst nightmare (unless she’s a Sloot too). This is a BIG one. Sofia has returned back from her world tour without getting jailed, although she was dangerously close to a public indecency arrest in Tulum. Just Sofia things. Next, we have a VERY informative Sloot University seminar on one of everyone’s favorite past times: EATING PUSSY. Carpet munching, fellatio, cunnilingus if you will. This is for EVERYONE who’s ever eaten or been interested in eating at the restaurant downstairs. It’s a 5 star establishment we should ALL try. Reservations aren’t hard to get either! Finally, Sofia tells a story about how SWAF REALLY came together including all of the tears, alcohol, and trauma that went down while trapped in an Airbnb with 2 randoms. Get your Kleenex ready Sloots, there are A LOT of tears of happiness in this one. 
Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/ 
Episode promo codes:
The Pill Club:
http://thepillclub.com/SOFIA
to receive your first birth control care package and donate to help more women in need of affordable birth control.

http://adamandeve.com
promo code SOFIA for free shipping

for 15% off your first order and free shipping
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
